name: Strings (GMTK2021)
description:
A game about strings. Not these kind of strings you're thinking about now - the other ones! Like Stephen Hawking type of strings - string theory, you know. A bit about dimensions and stuff, but I don't want to spoil that much. Please just check it out.

Was a rough time to develop actually. We had the premise not to build a 2D game, because we know there are a lot of these out there. 

Unfortunately time was running out in the end, cause we were only a group of 4. Hope you like the concept and have at least a bit of fun :D

Enjoy!

Controls:

WASD- Run

R - Respawn

Q/E - Split/Join dimensions
